alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; Camas Prairie; Lower Treasure Valley; Owyhee Mountains; Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Air Stagnation Advisory issued December 11 at 1:56PM MST until December 14 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...AIR STAGNATION ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM MST /10 PM PST/ THIS EVENING TO 8 PM MST /7 PM PST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...An extended period of stagnant air, with light winds and little vertical mixing. * WHERE...Portions of south central, southwest and west central Idaho and northeast and southeast Oregon. * WHEN...From 11 PM MST /10 PM PST/ this evening to 8 PM MST /7 PM PST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Periods of air stagnation can lead to the buildup of pollutants near the surface.
info.instruction: An Air Stagnation Advisory concerns itself with meteorological conditions only. For more information on air pollution in Idaho, visit website www.deq.idaho.gov. For Oregon, visit website www.oregon.gov/deq. If possible, reduce or eliminate activities that contribute to air pollution, such as outdoor burning, and the use of residential wood burning devices. Reduce vehicle trips and vehicle idling as much as possible.
